item.description:
<strong>Food and Medicine</strong>
The question in Tomas Krag's new ICT for Development FAQ, "Isn't food and medicine more important than technology?" reminded me
item.content:encoded:
Food and Medicine

The question in Tomas Krag’s new ICT for Development FAQ, “Isn’t food and medicine more important than technology?” reminded me
